--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "samuraiprofiler"

...> wrote:
>
> Sorry about the previous questions, they weren't very well =
thought
> through. Anyways the reason why I'm asking these new questions is=

> because, I need a primary source for my essay.

If you need a primary so=
urce, then this definitely isn't the place to
look for one. Answers from pe=
ople on this board, or from samurai
websites or what have you, would be wha=
t's called a "secondary source".
That is, people who didn't live during the=
 time you're researching. A
"primary source" is something written during th=
e actual time period.
It's the difference between reading The Book of Five =
Rings and reading a
book about The Book of Five Rings.
